snippet: Rahm Emanuel, the mayor of Chicago, and Jesus G. Garcia met in the first of three debates before the April 7th runoff.
abstract: Chicago mayoral candidates Rahm Emanuel and Jesus G Garcia meet in first of three televised debates as April 7th runoff election approaches.
lead_paragraph: Rahm Emanuel, the mayor of Chicago, and Jesus G. Garcia met in the first of three debates before the April 7th runoff.

headline.main: Candidates for Mayor Face Off in Chicago
headline.print_headline: Candidates for Mayor Face Off in Chicago
